English: As of version 1.2.0, vts-heartrate features its own Plugin API, so that you can build your own apps that consume or write heartrate data. There are three underlying API endpoints, all accessible via WebSocket. The Data API is a read-only endpoint. Your WebSocket will receive a message containing current heartrate and output parameter data once per frame (60 times per second). The Event API is a read-only endpoint. Your WebSocket will receive a message containing event information every time an Expression Trigger or Hotkey Trigger is triggered. The Input API is a read and write endpoint. Your WebSocket will be able to write heartrate data for use with the API WebSocket input method. For more information on how to use the API, please consult the API Documentation in the README.

Do you want to approve %settings_api_server_input_title access for the plugin named {0}, made by {1}? Doing so will grant the plugin permission to write heartrate data via the %input_websocket_title input.
Do you want to revoke %settings_api_server_input_title access from the plugin named {0}, made by {1}?

日本語: 新しいバージョンが入手可能です。
フィードバック・バグ報告

English: This plugin is being developed by Tom "Skeletom" Farro. You can reach him at: Twitter: @FomTarro Email: tom@skeletom.net
日本語: このプラグインは、Tom "Skeletom" Farro によって開発中です。ご質問・ご用件は Twitter @FomTarro、 もしくはメール tom@skeletom.net までご連絡ください。
開発者にメールを送る
開発者に@ツイートを送る

English: Input your expected range of heartrates here. %input_ranges_min refers to your low-stress heartrate, while %input_ranges_max refers to your high-stress heartrate. %input_ranges_offset refers to a flat value that can be added or subtracted to your real heartrate value. If you feel self-conscious about your heartrate, consider applying an %input_ranges_offset! The values of the various %button_tab_outputs will be scaled based on where your current heartrate lands along this range.
日本語: こちらに期待される心拍数の範囲を入力してください。%input_ranges_min は最低心拍数、%input_ranges_max は最大心拍数です。 各出力値 %button_tab_outputs は、現在の心拍数が入力した心拍数の範囲内のどこに位置するかによってスケーリングされます。

English:
Use the slider for quick testing of different heartrate values.
The slider range is from 0 to 255.
日本語:
テストスライダーで異なる心拍数の入力値を簡易テストできます。
スライダーの範囲は 0 から 255 までです。

English: This input method allows you to read heartrate data from the %settings_api_server_input_title. For more information about the API, consult the API Documentation in the README.

%input_pulsoid_overview By clicking the '%input_pulsoid_button_login' button, you will be asked to grant this plugin permission to connect to your account. You will then be given an '%input_pulsoid_token' which you must paste in to the plugin.
日本語: %input_pulsoid_overview 「%input_pulsoid_button_login」ボタンをクリックすると、プラグインがアカウントを連携させるよう承認が求められます。承認後に与えられた Pulsoid の 「%input_pulsoid_token」 をこのプラグインに貼り付けてください。

English: %input_pulsoid_overview From there, you should find a 'Feed URL' which you must paste into the plugin. Please note that Pulsoid may be deprecating this input method in the future, in favor of direct app connectivity.
日本語: %input_pulsoid_overview そこで表示される「Feed URL」をコピーし、プラグインに貼り付けてください。 なお、Pulsoid は今後この入力方式を非推奨または廃止とし、アプリとの直接接続を推奨する可能性がある点はご留意ください。

English: Pulsoid is a free third-party app for Android/iOS which allows for easy, reliable connectivity to a wide set of heartrate monitors. Once you have a Pulsoid account, you can use this input method to collect heartrate data from the service.
日本語: Pulsoid とは、Android/iOS用の無料サードパーティーアプリで、モバイル端末のBluetooth経由で幅広い心拍計に簡単・確実に接続することができます。Pulsoid のアカウントを作成すれば、この入力方式を用いて心拍数データを取得することができます。
ファイルからの読み込み

English:
Use this input method to read heartrate data from an external file.
The file must simply contain the numeric heartrate value in plain text. File path must be absolute.


Useful if you have another program that can output heartrate data.
日本語:
この入力方式を用いて、外部ファイルから心拍数データを読み込むことができます。
このファイルには心拍数データの数値のみがプレーンテキストで含まれている必要があります。ファイルパスは絶対パスである必要があります。


心拍数データが出力できる別のプログラムを使用する場合は便利です。
ファイルの絶対パスを入力

English: ANT+ is a low-power protocol supported by many sport and fitness sensors. This input method allows for direct connection to your ANT+ device, provided that you have a USB receiver plugged in. By clicking the 'Refresh' button, this plugin will begin a continuous scan for devices that output heartrate data. Then, simply select one from the dropdown and click the '%button_generic_connect' button. Please note that this plugin is not an officially licensed or certified affiliate of the ANT+ Brand.
日本語: ANT+ は、多くのスポーツやフィットネス系のウェアラブル端末で使用されている低電力プロトコルです。 この入力方式により、USB受信機がPCに接続されていれば、ANT+ デバイスとの直接接続が可能です。 「更新」ボタンをクリックすると、本プラグインは心拍数データを出力するデバイスのスキャンを開始します。 その後、ドロップダウンリストから希望のデバイスを選択し、「%button_generic_connect」ボタンをクリックするだけで、選択したデバイスと接続されます。 なお、このプラグインは ANT+ の公式ライセンスまたは認定ソフトウェアではありませんので、ご了承ください。

English: HypeRate is a free third-party app for Android/iOS which allows for easy, reliable connectivity to a wide set of heartrate monitors. Once you have a HypeRate account, you can use this input method to collect heartrate data from the service.

Fitbit is wearable fitness device brand, with an app for Android/iOS. In order to use your Fitbit with vts-heartrate, you will need to download a special companion app onto the Fitbit device itself. To do this, select your watch model from the dropdown. Then scan the '%input_fitbit_qr_download' QR code with your phone, which will take you to the Fitbit App Gallery listing for the companion app version that is compatible with your model. Follow the prompts on your phone to install this companion app via the Fitbit phone app. On the phone app, beneath the 'Install' button, there will be sections labelled as 'Permissions' and 'Settings'. Make sure to grant all requested permissions. Then navigate to 'Settings', where you will be prompted for %input_fitbit_ip, which is provided to you by the vts-heartrate PC app. Upon entering that information, your Fitbit watch should finally begin sending heartrate data to vts-heartrate after a short delay. If you ever need to return to the 'Settings' menu again, in order to update %input_fitbit_ip, simply scan the '%input_fitbit_qr_download' QR code again. This setup also requires that your phone is on the same network as the PC running vts-heartrate, because your phone is actually the device relaying information between the Fitbit and the PC.

As of October 2023, Pulsoid now natively supports Fitbit devices through their app! As such, it is highly recommended to use the 'Pulsoid' input method for this plugin, and connect your Fitbit device through that. For legacy purposes, this plugin will continue to feature its own semi-convoluted Fitbit integration for now. However, this input method will no longer recieve updates, and may be removed entirely in the future. For more information, check out the blog post below.
Which type of output module do you want to create?

You can use the %output_stream_widget_title as a Browser Source in OBS, or as a Web Item in VTube Studio. It prints your heartrate in real time, and the backing image does a pulsing animation at the corresponding speed. The widget will automatically attempt to connect to vts-heartrate when it loads, so if you open the widget before launching vts-heartrate, simply refresh the widget to connect.

日本語: アートメッシュの色付け

English: This output will gradually tint the matched Art Meshes the desired color, based on your current heartrate. Art Meshes are matched as long as their names or tags contain any of the provided list of text to match. For example, providing the text 'head,mouth,neck' will match Art Meshes with names like 'forehead', 'outermouth2', and 'leftneckside1'. Text to match must be comma separated and should not contain spaces. If you are unsure of what your Art Meshes are named, a great web-tool was developed by Hawkbar called VTubeStudioTagger, which offers an intuitive way to discover the names of your model's Art Meshes. Additionally, you can select specific Art Meshes by clicking the '%output_artmesh_selection_button' button, which will open a prompt in VTube Studio.
日本語: この出力は、現在の心拍数に基づいて、徐々にマッチされるアートメッシュに所望の色を薄く付けます。 アートメッシュは、その名前またはタグのテキストが、入力した検索対象リストのいずれかとマッチすればマッチされます。例えば、「鼻,頬,唇」を入力すると、「鼻」、「右頬1」、「上唇」などの名前が付いているアートメッシュがマッチされます。 検索対象となるテキストはカンマ「,」で区切り、スペースを含んではいけません。 自分のモデルのアートメッシュの名前がわからない場合、Hawkbar により開発された VTubeStudioTagger という優れたウェブツールを利用することで、モデルのアートメッシュの名前を簡単に確認することができます。
メッシュ名を入力（カンマ区切り）

English: Select Art Meshes in VTube Studio

The Art Meshes selected by this prompt will have a tint gradually applied to them as a function of your heartrate.

Meshes that match the naming criteria already entered in the text box are already selected.
This output will cause an Expression to activate or deactivate when the current heartrate is above or below a given threshold, based on the selected behavior settings.
日本語: この出力は、選択された設定に基づき、現在の心拍数が所定の閾値以上または以下になったときに、特定の表情を再生または元の表情に戻します。
閾値以上になると再生
閾値以上になると停止
閾値以下になると停止
閾値以下になると再生
ショートカットキートリガー

English: This output will cause a Hotkey to be triggered when the current heartrate is above or below a given threshold, based on the selected behavior settings.
日本語: この出力は、選択された設定に基づき、現在の心拍数が所定の閾値以上または以下になったときに、特定のショートカットキーを動作させます。
閾値以上になると動作
閾値以下になると動作

English: VTube Studio offers a ton of cool post-processing rendering effects, called "visual effects" or "VFX" for short. You can make the intensity of these effects scale with your heartrate using %output_custom_params_title! Simply select the desired tracking parameter that you want to use to control a given config value of the effect. You can then additionally modify the config value using the slider to increase or decrease its maximum intensity. There is a lot of customizability with this feature, so it is recommended that you play around with different values and see how they look by using the %input_slider_title input method to try out a range of heartrates.
Are you sure you want to reset all configured parameters for this effect? This will set all parameters to 0.0.

This plugin outputs 15 custom tracking parameters for use. They are as follows: VTS_Heartrate_Linear: %param_vts_heartrate_linear VTS_Heartrate_Pulse: %param_vts_heartrate_pulse VTS_Heartrate_Breath: %param_vts_heartrate_breath VTS_Heartrate_BPM: %param_vts_heartrate_bpm_all VTS_Heartrate_BPM (_Ones, _Tens, _Hundreds): %param_vts_heartrate_bpm_generic VTS_Heartrate_Repeat (_1, _5, _10, _20, _30, _60, _120, _Breath): %param_vts_heartrate_repeat_generic
日本語: このプラグインは次のように、四つのカスタムトラッキングパラメータを出力します。 VTS_Heartrate_Linear：心拍数が期待される範囲内で変化する際、比例して 0.0 から 1.0 にスケールする値。 VTS_Heartrate_Pulse：心拍数と一致する周波数で、0.0から1.0の間で振動する値。 VTS_Heartrate_Breath：VTS_Heartrate_Pulse（心拍数）より遅い周波数で、0.0から1.0の間で振動する値。モデルの ParamBreath（呼吸パラメータ）をコントロールするのに適しています。 VTS_Heartrate_BPM：0 から 255 まで、実際の現在の心拍数を表す値。（この出力値は実際値であり、最小値 0.0 〜最大値 1.0 にスケーリングされた値ではありません）

English: Learn how to use Custom Parameters
日本語: カスタムパラメータの使用方法についてはこちら

English: A value that scales linearly from 0.0 to 1.0 as your heartrate moves across the expected range.
日本語: 心拍数が期待される範囲内で変化する際、比例して 0.0 から 1.0 にスケールする値。

English: A value that bounces back and forth between 0.0 and 1.0 with a frequency exactly matching your heartrate.
日本語: 心拍数と一致する周波数で、0.0から1.0の間で振動する値。

English: A value that bounces back and forth between 0.0 and 1.0 with a frequency slower than VTS_Heartrate_Pulse, suitable for controlling your model's ParamBreath output.
日本語: VTS_Heartrate_Pulse（心拍数）より遅い周波数で、0.0から1.0の間で振動する値。モデルの ParamBreath（呼吸パラメータ）をコントロールするのに適しています。

English: A value that represents the actual current BPM from 0 to 255, rather than a normalized value from 0.0 to 1.0.
日本語: 0 から 255 まで、実際の現在の心拍数を表す値。（この出力値は実際値であり、最小値 0.0 〜最大値 1.0 にスケーリングされた値ではありません）

English: A value from 0 to 9 that represents the ones, tens or hundreds digit of the current BPM.
A value from 0 to 9 that represents the first digit of the current BPM. For example, with a heartrate of 95, this parameter would be 5.
A value from 0 to 9 that represents the second digit of the current BPM. For example, with a heartrate of 95, this parameter would be 9.
A value from 0 to 9 that represents the third digit of the current BPM. For example, with a heartrate of 95, this parameter would be 0.
A value that scales linearly from 0.0 to 1.0 and resets back to 0.0 with every fixed number of heartbrats, denoted by the number at the end of the parameter name.
A value that scales linearly from 0.0 to 1.0 and resets back to 0.0 with every heartbeat.
A value that scales linearly from 0.0 to 1.0 and resets back to 0.0 with every 5 heartbeats.
A value that scales linearly from 0.0 to 1.0 and resets back to 0.0 with every 10 heartbeats.
A value that scales linearly from 0.0 to 1.0 and resets back to 0.0 with every 20 heartbeats.
A value that scales linearly from 0.0 to 1.0 and resets back to 0.0 with every 30 heartbeats.
A value that scales linearly from 0.0 to 1.0 and resets back to 0.0 with every 60 heartbeats.
A value that scales linearly from 0.0 to 1.0 and resets back to 0.0 with every 120 heartbeats.
A value that scales linearly from 0.0 to 1.0 and resets back to 0.0 with the frequency of the VTS_Heartrate_Breath parameter.
Are you sure that you want to copy the profile configuration from {0} to your currently loaded profile, {1}? Doing so will permanently overwrite the settings of your currently loaded profile.
日本語: 現在読み込んでいるモデル {1} に、モデル {0} の設定をコピーしますか？ コピーすると、現在読み込んでいるモデルに対する設定は永久的に削除されます。

English: Profiles allow you to have multiple output configurations for the same model. For example, you may want one profile where you go blue in the face for Horror Games, and another profile where you flush red and activate a sweating expression for Workouts. You can even copy profile configurations from one profile to another, even across models. This is useful if you have multiple variations of the same base model, such as different outfits. When a model is loaded in VTube Studio, a DEFAULT profile is automatically loaded along with it. User-created profiles must be loaded manually. If the automatically loaded profile does not match the model you have loaded in VTube Studio, click the %output_force_reload_model_button button.
Are you sure that you want to permanently delete the profile {0}? A profile cannot be restored once it is deleted.
Are you sure that you want to rename this profile from {0} to {1}?
A profile with this name already exists for the currently active model.
Loading a profile that belongs to a model other than the currently active model is not currently supported. Current model: {0} Profile model: {1}
